# Outline

* Summary of use at last intercourse by
    * used at least one method of contraception at last intercourse (with someone of opposite sex, in past 3 months)
    * did not have intercourse with someone of opposite sex in past 3 months
    * who were pregnant at last intercourse or whose last intercourse partner is pregnant
    * is intending to conceive
    * is infertile
    * had last intercourse with infertile partner
    * otherwise did not use contraception
* By method, what methods were used at last intercourse
* By method, what methods were used exclusively at last intercourse
* By method, what proportion of method users used the method simultaneously with another method
* Use for reasons other than contraception
    * for pill
    * for IUD
    * for tubal ligation
    * for condom
* Among those not sexually active with opposite sex in past 3 months, how many have never had sexual intercourse vs just not recently
    * of those who have never had sexual intercourse, why
    * how many who are not sexually active with opposite sex in past 3 months report being mostly or only attracted to the same sex
